mapper.insert: insert into animal (uuid, name_cn, name_en, introduce, create_time, update_time, user_uuid) values (#{uuid}, #{nameCn}, #{nameEn}, #{introduce}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{userUuid});
mapper.update: update animal SET name_cn = #{nameCn}, name_en = #{nameEn}, introduce = #{introduce}, update_time = #{updateTime} where uuid = #{uuid};
mapper.select: SELECT uuid, name_cn, name_en, introduce, create_time, update_time, user_uuid from animal
select uuid, name_cn, name_en, introduce, create_time, update_time, user_uuid from animal where uuid = #{uuid};
select uuid, name_cn, name_en, introduce, create_time, update_time, user_uuid from animal where name_cn like CONCAT('%',#{nameCn},'%');
select uuid, name_cn, name_en, introduce, create_time, update_time, user_uuid from animal where name_en like CONCAT('%',#{nameEn},'%');
